title: Part 2: What is a meaningful life? — Money
description:
How is money an answer to what a meaningful life is? Is money important? What is money? How should we look at money? All these and other questions discussed in this episode. 

This is episode 3 of my podcast. 

Check out my podcast: Fining Ideas | The Colton Kirby Show

--Links--
My Website: https://www.coltonkirby.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_coltonkirby
Parler: https://parler.com/profile/coltonkirby/posts
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/coltonjkirby/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/_coltonkirby/
Pintrest: https://www.pinterest.com/coltonjkirby/
Quora: https://www.quora.com/profile/Colton-Kirby-7
